DOC.brief_summary: The aim randomize , control , multi-center study assess clinical radiographic outcome use StraumannÂ® Bone Level Tapered implant immediate implantation follow extraction tooth pre-molar anterior region maxilla mandible ( test ) compare outcomes place implant heal site ( control ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective demonstrate change mean peri-implant marginal bone level change ( mesial distal ) load 12 month post-loading test treatment bad control treatment . The secondary objective study assess difference clinical radiographic outcome test control treatment 12 month post-loading look implant success survival , buccal bone dimensional change , implant stability , soft tissue change , subject satisfaction , adverse event . An additional objective ass long-term difference clinical radiographic outcome , measure primary secondary objective , span two , three , four , five year .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must voluntarily sign informed consent form study related procedure Subjects must males female minimum 18 year age Subjects need single tooth extraction premolar anterior region maxilla mandible ( ADA tooth position 413 2029 ) replacement dental implant . Implants must place either immediately extraction socket place heal site ( great 4 month heal ) previously graft . Planned site implant must natural tooth mesially distally adjacent tooth position Subjects must oppose dentition ( natural teeth , fix removable restoration ) There must sufficient bone implant site achieve primary stability Subjects must commit study require followup visit Subjects must good general health assess Investigator Subjects systemic disease would preclude dental implant surgery Subjects contraindications oral surgical procedure Subjects mucosal disease ( e.g. , erosive lichen planus ) localize area around study implant site Subjects history local irradiation therapy head/neck area Subjects untreated endodontic lesion untreated periodontal disease adjacent implant site Subjects receive , history receiving , intravenous subcutaneous antiresorptive agent , bisphosphonates Subjects severe bruxing , parafunctional habit , temporomandibular joint dysfunction Any implant sit buccal dehiscence great 3 mm fenestration implant Subjects inadequate oral hygiene unmotivated adequate home care Subjects physical mental handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene Subjects pregnant intend become pregnant duration study Subjects heavy smoker ( define > 10 cigarette per day > 1 cigar per day ) chew tobacco Subjects abuse alcohol drug Subjects undergone administration investigational device within 30 day enrollment study Subjects condition circumstance , opinion investigator , would prevent completion study participation interfere analysis study result , history noncompliance unreliability
